description:
** v.3.1.0: Added a few words. Thanks goes to Jessie and Ron for the suggestions! **

Buenos días!

This is the iCaramba Spanish Audio Dictionary. It will help you spell and pronounce every word that is included.

Instead of cramming every Spanish word there is into this dictionary, it focuses on the 500 words you're most likely to use and adds audio to every one of them. It is thus an excellent travel-companion.

FEATURES:
- ALL words have audio!
- Alphabetically sorted by English and Spanish.
- Very user-friendly navigation.

For more Spanish apps, visit: www.iLoveLingo.com

Bienvenido!
versionNote:
- Words added.
- Links updated to our new webpage: www.iLoveLingo.com
